1.title: Who Knows Better Than I

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: The COs at Litchfield's maximum security unit size up the new arrivals. Off her medication, Suzanne hallucinates.

2.title: Sh*tstorm Coming

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Ordered to handout harsh sentences; the feds search for scapegoats. Languishing on paid suspension, Caputo tries to break out of a rut.

3.title: Look Out for Number One

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Linda makes a power play; Piper digs for information about Alex and the women get their first taste of a decades old feud between cellblocks.

4.title: I'm the Talking Ass

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Aleida struggles to find work on the outside. Backed into a corner, Nikki pleads her case to Red. Taystee reaches out to Caputo for help.

5.title: Mischief Mischief

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Pranksters wreak havoc on Halloween. Luschek earns points with the other guards. As Linda faces a crisis, Donuts and Pennsatucky have a change of plans.

6.title: State of the Uterus

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: While Daddy deals with backlash, Badison plots revenge. Flaca finds a co-host for her radio show. Lorna discovers that pregnancy has its perks.

7.title: Changing Winds

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Badison hustles to get back in Carol's good graces. Blanca longs to get pregnant -- and Nicky has a plan. Caputo and Figueroa's relationship evolves.

8.title: Gordons

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: Taystee gets fan mail -- and an assist from an old friend. Piper lobbies Luschek to bring back kickball. Aleida tries out a new sales tactic.

9.title: Break the String

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: While Daddy buys time with Barb; Daya looks for new ways to bring in oxy. Black Cindy's guilt takes a toll on her body. Red acquires a powerful ally.

10.title: Chocolate Chip Nookie

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: Aleida seizes a business opportunity. An anonymous tip sends Caputo on a stakeout. Luschek tries to help Gloria, who worries she's in danger.

11.title: Well This Took a Dark Turn

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: While Red and Carol scheme against Frieda; Suzanne watches Frieda's back. Lorna swears her allegiance to Barb as Nicky works to thwart another plot.

12.title: Double Trouble

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: Carol and Barb prepare for war. Linda auditions inmates for a prison PR video. Alex makes a deal with Badison to keep Piper out of trouble.

13.title: Be Free

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: Piper gets surprising news and a boost from her friends. The jury returns with a verdict; and the big kickball game is on.

1.title: I Wasn't Ready

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Piper Chapman is sent to jail as a result of her relationship with a drug smuggler.

2.title: Tit Punch

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: After accidentally insulting the prison's chef, the kitchen staff refuses to feed Piper.

3.title: Lesbian Request Denied

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Piper must deal with romantic advances from a fellow inmate known as Crazy Eyes.

4.title: Imaginary Enemies

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Piper gets to know her stern new roommate. The inmates prepare for a farewell party.

5.title: The Chickening

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: While on the lawn one morning, Piper sees a chicken roosting nearby on the grass. When she tells other inmates about the odd sighting, Piper discovers that the chicken is actually a prison legend that several inmates have tried to catch for years. The complicated history between Aleida Diaz and her daughter Dayanara Diaz comes to light.

6.title: WAC Pack

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: The inmates must campaign amongst their races for a coveted spot as a prisoners' representative. Piper steers clear of the bizarre political process but might not have a choice but to get involved. Larry's editor wants him to write an article about Piper's incarceration.

7.title: Blood Donut

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Former high school track star Janae Watson returns from solitary confinement. Piper wants to reopen the outdoor track but Healy forces her to fulfill several potentially dangerous tasks before he will consider it. Alex's teasing of a religious fanatic named Tiffany "Pennsatucky" Doggett sparks a rivalry.

8.title: Moscow Mule

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: Officer Mendez begins harassing Red when she refuses to help him continue smuggling drugs into the prison. Larry publishes his article about Piper in the New York Times, which turns her into a person of interest for inmates and corrections officers alike. Piper's best friend Polly has her baby at the same time that a baby is born to an inmate in Piper's cell block.

9.title: Fucksgiving

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Piper is in high spirits when she makes peace with Alex and awaits a visit from Larry on Thanksgiving. However, Healy's true colors come out when he throws Piper in solitary confinement for dancing with Alex. The frightening experience of solitary forces Piper to take a serious look at her life and come to several conclusions about the future.

10.title: Bora Bora Bora

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: Pennsatucky flaunts her new healing hands that Jesus has supposedly given her. The prison brings in a group of teenage troublemakers so that the inmates can scare them straight. Tricia returns from detox to find she has lost her position on the kitchen staff and must still deal with Mendez breathing down her neck for her drug debts.

11.title: Tall Men with Feelings

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: Grief looms over the prison as the inmates mourn a recent suicide. Dayanara, Nicky, and Red plot to end Mendez's career by tricking him into revealing his indiscretions. Larry gives a radio interview about Piper's experience in prison and his comments cause conflict with some of Piper's closest allies.

12.title: Fool Me Once

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: After discovering a series of sad truths, friendships change. Tiffany 'Pennsatucky' Doggett is offended by Piper Chapman, and that lead to the dangerous roads. Larry finally meets Piper after the radio show to discuss their future.

13.title: Can't Fix Crazy

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: Alex makes a final decision about Piper and Larry finally decides what will happen to Piper after meeting Alex for the first time. Red's plan to retrieve her kitchen goes awry. Piper is forced to stand up to another inmate.

1.title: Thirsty Bird

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Piper is awakened in solitary and, without being given any information, is forced to board a bus and a plane to whereabouts unknown.

2.title: Looks Blue, Tastes Red

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: A job fair is being held at the prison, which Taystee attends, Red must face being alone, and Pennsatucky leaves the SHU.

3.title: Hugs Can Be Deceiving

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Piper is challenged by her Soso experience; Morello gets her heart broken; a figure from Taystee's past arrives to disturb the status quo.

4.title: A Whole Other Hole

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Morello takes a ride, the girls learn about the female body, Piper and Big Boo make a deal, Miss Rosa meets a boy, and Larry and Polly have a day together.

5.title: Low Self Esteem City

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: A bathroom turf war sees deeper lines drawn in the sand as Gloria and Vee go head to head. Piper receives devastating news.

6.title: You Also Have a Pizza

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Love is in the air as the inmates prepare for a Valentine's Day party; Red makes an intriguing new discovery. Larry asks Piper to be his prison mole.

7.title: Comic Sans

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Vee starts her inmate run business, Black Cindy is having issues , Bennett gets blackmailed, and Piper begins her newspaper club.

8.title: Appropriately Sized Pots

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: Piper faces a new backlash over special privileges; Caputo feels pressure to toughen up, resulting in administrative changes.

9.title: 40 Oz. of Furlough

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: When Piper finally leaves the prison from her furlough agreement, she has issues with her family, and at the same time Pornstache is back and makes the prison a 'hellhole'

10.title: Little Mustachioed Shit

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: The prison guards finally crack down on the inmates to stop the smuggling issue. After Bennett framed Pornstache, problems arise. And a big secret between Piper and Polly is revealed.

11.title: Take a Break from Your Values

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: Piper is shocked at an unexpected change in her status; Soso's hunger strike attracts new support that takes on a religious fervour.

12.title: It Was the Change

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: Tensions run high as a prison power outage forces several issues to come to light; Piper finds herself compromised and is forced to think on her feet.

13.title: We Have Manners. We're Polite.

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: Several futures hang in the balance as the inmates face and confront their worst nightmares; Life will never be the same again.

1.title: Mother's Day

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Caputo's kinder, gentler new regime includes organizing a Mother's Day fair for the inmates that brings up a LOT of mixed feelings about family.

2.title: Bed Bugs and Beyond

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Tempers flare when bed bugs invade, as Alex cracks, Red lashes out at Piper, Aleida interferes with Daya and Bennett, and Caputo gets bad news.

3.title: Empathy Is a Boner Killer

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Nicky's stash situation gets complicated. Alex and Crazy Eyes try a new drama class. Red assists Healy with a personal matter.

4.title: Finger in the Dyke

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Big Boo comes up with a scheme to make money. Daya, Taystee and Crazy Eyes confront reality. Caputo tries to make a good impression on some visitors.

5.title: Fake It Till You Fake It Some More

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Rumors fly among the inmates about a new, higher-paying job assignment, especially when they have to take a test for it.

6.title: Ching Chong Chang

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Regime change isn't going over well the staff, but Red makes it work for her. Lorna finds a new way to meet men. Chang shows her private side.

7.title: Tongue-Tied

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Norma's healing powers draw more believers. Piper creates a new business venture. Caputo breaks in new hires.

8.title: Fear, and Other Smells

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: Piper gets creative in order to grow her new business. Crazy Eyes's sci-fi sex story for drama class is a hit. Alex doesn't trust a new inmate named Lolly.

9.title: Where My Dreidel At

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Too many inmates seem to be getting religious, so a rabbi comes to visit and Leanne tries to organize Norma's followers.

10.title: A Tittin' and a Hairin'

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: Pennsatucky, Piper, Crazy Eyes, and Lorna get closer with their new admirers. Tensions between Sophia and Gloria, and Alex and Lolly escalate.

11.title: We Can Be Heroes

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: Caputo and Piper confront labor issues. A miracle occurs in Norma's group. Crazy Eyes's erotica winds up in the hands of the staff.

12.title: Don't Make Me Come Back There

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: Daya goes into labor. Sophia suffers a hate crime. Stella helps Piper with a business snag. Taystee takes on a new role.

13.title: Trust No Bitch

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: Miracles and conversions occur, but Piper and Caputo know that some situations can't be dealt with through spiritual means.

1.title: Work That Body for Me

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: With a major security breach and a lot of new inmates, Caputo has to call in the big guns. Things get a little too real for Crazy Eyes and Lolly.

2.title: Power Suit

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: The newcomers stir up ethnic and domestic conflicts, but Maria sees an opportunity. Judy's special treatment raises eyebrows.

3.title: (Don't) Say Anything

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: A new job puts Taystee close to Caputo. Lorna has to get creative in her marriage. Soso and Poussey deal with some awkward truths.

4.title: Doctor Psycho

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Nothing stays hidden for long when emotions run high, but Red, Healy and Caputo try to keep the peace. Piper has a business competitor.

5.title: We'll Always Have Baltimore

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Company policies lead to a shortage of critical supplies and an eventful trip to a prison convention. Piscatella starts a new anti-gang initiative.

6.title: Piece of Sh*t

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Piper's plan to edge out the competition could backfire badly. Cindy finds a way to make Taystee's job pay off. Luschek gets some interesting mail.

7.title: It Sounded Nicer in My Head

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Paranoia strikes deep for Lolly and Judy, aggravating an already tense situation. Red sticks to a Russian tradition for an important occasion.

8.title: Friends in Low Places

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: A new work detail doesn't go over well with the inmates. Judy seeks help from Poussey. Maria finds a place she can conduct business.

9.title: Turn Table Turn

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Ramos and Flores figure out ways to rebel against authority. A news item has an unexpected effect. Red and Lorna face personal disappointment.

10.title: Bunny, Skull, Bunny, Skull

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: The movie night selection becomes controversial. Aleida makes an adjustment. Piper worries the prison punishments are getting too medieval.

11.title: People Persons

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: Caputo's leadership is challenged and the inmates are in for a long night of lockdown after workers make an unsettling discovery.

12.title: The Animals

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: Alliances shift among the prison "families" as Piscatella and his guards crack down. Poussey, Judy and Alex prefer to look ahead to the future.

13.title: Toast Can't Never Be Bread Again

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: Corporate bureaucracy and simmering anger work against Caputo's efforts to keep a sensitive situation under control.

1.title: Riot FOMO

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: As the standoff at the prison spirals into a full-blown riot, enterprising inmates take advantage of the confusion. Taystee confronts Caputo.

2.title: F*ck, Marry, Frieda

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Maria convenes a special assembly in the chapel as the inmates plot their next move. Frieda makes use of the survival skills she learned as a kid.

3.title: Pissters!

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Linda begins to see the prison in a new light, while Judy grows desperate to escape. With darkness falling, the inmates compile a list of demands.

4.title: Litchfield's Got Talent

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Red and Blanca dig for dirt on Piscatella. Suzanne conducts a séance. The guards show off their talents for "Litchfield Idol" judges Leanne and Angie.

5.title: Sing It, White Effie

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: When the inmates' antics make the morning news, Flaca and Maritza soak up the spotlight. Brandy and her crew auction off Judy to the highest bidder.

6.title: Flaming Hot Cheetos, Literally

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Boo defends Doggett, Janae consoles Soso, and Lorna comes on to Nicky. While Alex lays low in the yard, Piper decides to take a stand.

7.title: Full Bush, Half Snickers

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Black Cindy concocts a scheme to distract Suzanne when she spirals out of control. Taystee and Piper search for ways to honor Poussey's memory.

8.title: Tied to the Tracks

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: While Taystee sits down with a negotiator, Red and Blanca put their own plan into action. Gloria counsels Daya and asks Caputo for a favor.

9.title: The Tightening

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Red senses trouble, but the others are convinced she's just paranoid. Taystee and Black Cindy enlist an unlikely ally, and two old friends clash.

10.title: The Reverse Midas Touch

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: Taystee tries to keep the negotiations on track. Angie comes up with an idea for fixing Leanne's finger. Piscatella's past is revealed.

11.title: Breaking the Fiberboard Ceiling

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: Red and the others weigh their options. Gloria wrestles with her conscience as she moves forward with a plan. Lorna takes over the pharmacy.

12.title: Tattoo You

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: Boo dabbles in blackmail, Nicky promises to help Lorna, Doggett makes a discovery, and Piper comes to a realization about Alex.

13.title: Storm-y Weather

episode of.title: Orange Is the New Black (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: As chaos descends on Litchfield three days into the riot, the inmates wonder what the future holds and seek solace in loved ones.

imdb.plot outline: Piper Chapman is a public relations executive with a career and a fiance when her past suddenly catches up to her. In her mid-30s she is sentenced to spend time in a minimum-security women's prison in Connecticut for her association with a drug runner 10 years earlier. This Netflix original series is based on the book of the same title. Forced to trade power suits for prison orange, Chapman makes her way through the corrections system and adjusts to life behind bars, making friends with the many eccentric, unusual and unexpected people she meets.
imdb.title: Orange Is the New Black
plot: Convicted of a decade old crime of transporting drug money to an ex-girlfriend, normally law-abiding Piper Chapman is sentenced to a year and a half behind bars to face the reality of how life-changing prison can really be.::ahmetkozan

Piper Chapman is a public relations executive with a career and a fiance when her past suddenly catches up to her. In her mid-30s she is sentenced to spend time in a minimum-security women's prison in Connecticut for her association with a drug runner 10 years earlier. This Netflix original series is based on the book of the same title. Forced to trade power suits for prison orange, Chapman makes her way through the corrections system and adjusts to life behind bars, making friends with the many eccentric, unusual and unexpected people she meets.::Jwelch5742
